trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Ahmaergo has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Ahmaergo can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Ahmaergo can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Extra Damage
entries: If Ahmaergo has more than half his hit points remaining he deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage on every hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ahmaergo makes three attacks with his greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) slashing damage

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.
